DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , clinical pharmacology study investigate drug-drug interaction patient RA .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study MRA Patient With Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Patients diagnose RA accord 1987 American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) classification criterion Patients contract RA least 6 month prior Exclusion criterion Patients Class IV Steinbrocker functional impairment enrollment . Patients treat underlying disease biological agent , infliximab etanercept receive treatment leflunomide , within 12 week initiation treatment probe drug
